title: The perceived challenges to online learning during the COVID-19 pandemic: A nationwide study of K-12 parental perspectives (Arab and other parents) in Qatar
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Yousef M. Alshaboul, Manar A. Alazaizeh, Abdel Latif Sellami, Abdullah M. Abu-Tineh, Norma Ghamrawi, Tarek Shal
